title: Dazzle, Volume 08
description: Alzeid, Baroqueheat, and Rahzel finally meet up together in the village of Vellnene with important new pieces of information. Rahzel discovers that her biological father is still alive, but is held back from meeting him...and instead is greeted by her adoptive father, who is also Baroqueheat's older brother. Could this be the end of their adventures together?
author: Minari Endoh
